column4: Nabend, wie kann ich unter 7.10 Gutsy denn nun Beryl themes benutzen ?
oops, wrong language. Could someone explain how to get Beryl Themes working in 7.10 Gutsy Gibbon ?
anssi, I do it all the time with normal texteditor

if you like change screen resolution with Preferences, will it keep your manual edits in xorg.conf? I remember I never understood the Debian way to control the X configuration file with dpkg-reconfigure...
